entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
